title: When did Matt Lucas marry Kevin McGee as he honours his late husband?
text:
Matt Lucas and Kevin McGee were married in 2006 (Picture: WireImage)

Comedian Matt Lucas has shared a heartbreaking tribute to his late husband Kevin McGee on the 10th anniversary of his death.

The Little Britain star shared a snap of a smiling Kevin, who tragically took his own life in 2009, standing on a station platform, calling him ‘funny and silly and clever and kind and handsome’ in the post.

‘This is Kevin John McGee, who died ten years ago today,’ he wrote. ‘I loved him more than anyone I’ve ever met, and still do,’ he wrote.

‘He was so funny and silly and clever and kind and handsome and his smile made my heart soar. We were together for nearly six years and he made me the happiest man on the planet.’

‘In the end he lost his battle with addiction and depression. I guess some people don’t have the armour for this world.

‘I think of him probably a hundred times a day, every day. In truth, I think of little else. I would give anything to see him again and maybe one day I will, but for now I will be grateful for the time we had together and the love we shared. ‘It was like no other.’

Who was Kevin McGee and when did he marry Matt Lucas?

Matt remembered his tragic late husband in an emotional Instagram tribute (Picture: Matt Lucas/Instagram)

Kevin was a TV producer for Carbon Media, a branch of TV company Princess Productions.

His credits included such shows as The Real Little Britain, Jump Britain, The Morning After Show and Comic Relief: Red Nose Night Live 05.

He and Matt were married in 2006 in a pantomime-themed ceremony at Home House in central London.

The pair were joined by celebrity guests including Paul O’Grady, Barbara Windsor, Sir Elton John and Courtney Love for the big day, celebrating with a party in which guests dressed up in costume.

When did Matt Lucas and Kevin McGee split?

Matt and Kevin had a flamboyant wedding party with everybody in costume (Picture: FilmMagic)

The couple announced in June 2008 that they had split, just 18 months after their wedding.

Kevin, who struggled with drug addiction and depression, was tragically found dead at his Edinburgh flat on 6 October 2009.

Matt previously revealed the devastating effect Kevin’s loss had had on his life, admitting he used sex to help him cope.

Speaking to the Sunday Times in 2017 Matt said: ‘I think people respond in all different ways to grief. I thought I was very conscientious going to a bereavement counsellor and not turning to drink, which I hardly ever do – I probably have six units a year.

Matt moved to the US in 2012 (Picture: Getty Images)

‘I’m not going to start smoking again, I’m not going to do drugs. But I ended up eating lots and having lots of sex. That was how I responded. As much as anything I was trying to distract myself.’

The comedian – who more recently has been seen as Nardole in Doctor Who – also moved to California in 2012 in an attempt to start afresh.

‘I wanted to build a new life. The first thing [they say] when something as terrible as that happens is not to do anything radical,’ he explained.

‘Don’t immediately sell your house when someone dies, don’t get a new job. But enough time had gone by for me to think now was the time to move on. I thought I had to go somewhere warm, so I went to California.’
